title: New loot: Soulstealer Vayne and Hextech Ward

replies.body: I have a higher chance mining a real gemstone in real life than getting a gemstone from a chest in this game
{{champion:44}} "I found millions of gemstones to complete my armor, but I haven't found even 1 hextech gemstone."
3 gemstones so far, still need more...
I once didn't know just how rare gemstones were. So I used one to open another chest and got another gemstone. Best day of my life.
ive spent about $50 on hextech and got around 4 gems and thought "i dont need these i dont even play annie" but now as a {{champion:67}} main i wish i had saved them{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
4 in $50? Dude go buy some lotto tickets that's insane.
And that chest gave you an {{champion:6}}  champion shard.

I mean I live in Nevada so I can drive 10 miles to a quartz quary and literally pick up 1/2 crystals off the ground....

that aside, no literally it's stupid. Brofresco spent 500$ to get hextech Annie. The chances of someone getting 10 gems for free is basically none unless they play league until they are 50.
That's why rito said you can BUY them in small amounts if you actually read the article
who the fuck knows how to read
Literally began crying cause this made my sides hurt.
I am genuinely so sorry
Is mayonnaise an instrument?
They better use blue essence, cause I got no use for these
Brofresco did as well? Dang. Redmercy AND Brofresco got jipped.

Tbh, for $500 they aren't worth it

Not to say they aren't good skins...but for the trouble it is to get them I don't see it as worth it
They made money off of the video though

Yes, but here you are talking about them, like many other people do whenever anything about gemstones is brought up. Free advertising for months for the cost of what they make in 1 stream.

They didn't get jipped.
We should also keep in mind how many skins they actually kept during the process.
{{summoner:6}} woah wtfast is up pimps and players

Poros are cute
give me a like for the poro squad
How many Vayne mains are {{item:3070}} because we want this skin and know we will never get it?

I'm not just crying, I'm flooding my house.
(no seriously can someone call the fire department)
Call the fire department for excess of water? {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
Brand gets healed from nami's water anything goes here {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
and burned by ignite......{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
Yes. Fire departments deal with flooding as well as fires. {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
He obviously meant he flooded his house with fire. Right?...Right?...No?...Okay....

Why are people still complaining about the gems and Hextech Crafting? Riot is giving you the chance to get free skins and all you do is complain. "I want this skin, I wanted that skin. I don't even play Ezreal, why did you give me the stupid TPA skin?" I am grateful for every single skin I have gotten, even if I don't play that champion. Hell, I even have a reason to learn that champ now. Don't like a skin? Disenchant it, or save it for a re-roll. Riot Games let's you play a free game and now gives you free skins and champions. You all throw a fit when your support takes the gold and cs, yet you get mad when Riot tries to make a little money for all the hard work they put into this game. You can earn Soulstealer Vayne in a normal chest, or with gem stones. Either way, you either need to learn to have the patience of a Lee Sin camping top lane, or just give up and take a chance in other lanes. I'd personally would like to thank Riot for giving someone like me; who can't afford skins, have the chance to receive such nice skins. I appreciate what you do for your players.

YES

I am a {{champion:67}} main and I approve and completely agree.

I think the main problem is theme consistency. If it was Hextech Vayne that was exclusive I'm sure almost no one would complain. If it was something new like Clockwork Vayne no one would complain. However, Soulstealer theme was already established before in the form of a Vladimir skin you could buy with RP. Another Soulstealer skin has absolutely no reason to be a crafting exclusive.

Really? The problem is that it is Soulstealer theme? If being an established skin theme is the problem are you just going to ignore all the Hextech skins that existed before Annie? What is this logic?

i agree riot is probably taking a HUGE hit in profits for this system that they gave us and you people COMPLAIN ABOUT IT every skin i have i got from this system it has already saved me a crap ton of $ so stop being such a whiny crybaby and accept a good thing that came your way

Thanks, Riot, for adding more shit to make me feel great about the fact that I have a wallet the size of {{champion:17}} 's genitals.  
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
{{champion:115}} hahhahhah
{{champion:44}} Getting 10 gemstones is outrageous...and not the good kind of outrageous.
completely unrelated, I apologize. but can we get a "random" button for skin selection in games for players with multiple skins
They've said in a Alpha Client QnA that they will be looking at this feature but it will not be top priority.

Honestly, who cares if they've added a few items that are hard to obtain without spending money on. It's THEIR game, and they already make almost everything else free to get. Why not let them have a skin or two that they can make big money on, from people that are willing to pay?
I feel Cheated that you have the ability to directly purchase Gemstones..... i worked so hard to unbox gemstones for my Hextech Annie.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Too bad that skin's probably the 2nd ugliest skin hue.

{{champion:119}} ~ I'm the original soul stealer.. Yeah YEAHHH!
Pretty sure they did that intentionally.
{{champion:83}} Getting a gemstone is like the chances of seeing a yorick in a normal match {{item:3070}} True but sad :")
Where is my new {{champion:267}} skin though? {{item:3070}}
Gosu *rushes to buy RP to spam hextech chest and keys*
I haven't gotten a box in months, just key frags, starting to think only way to get boxes are to buy them
You get boxes by getting S with different champs (or someone in your premade getting an S), so either your not getting S's, your not premaking with good people, or you have a very small champ pool

Gemstones are way too rare to find, I find.

I haven't gotten a single one so far.
